Parkour Classes in Scranton, Pennsylvania

It is certain that parkour is about individual development. But the parkour practitioner also knows that parkour is also about community, kinship, and camaraderie. The gathering and communal training of parkour practitioners is the catalyst for creating life-long friendships and the glue that holds the community together.

Adult Classes (ages 14+) Have begun!

October 2015 Location: Nay Aug Park. Meet near the water slide.

Time: Every Sunday promptly at 3:00pm. Be on time! We may leave the meeting area and it might be difficult to find us.

Cost: Classes cost *$20. No monthly contract or obligation. Just pay when you come, and keep coming if you like what we do!

Classes with Parkour Endure are led by coaches certified through A.D.A.P.T. You, are guaranteed the highest quality parkour coaching offered in the region. If it would be your first class with Parkour Endure, please call John at (717) 343-4727 so you know what you need to bring.

*I want these classes to be accessible. We have a price reduction for those with financial need, and also a Traveler Package for those who travel more than 30 miles to attend Parkour Endure's events. Please Contact Us for more information.

There are occasional free training sessions. Everyone is welcome. Keep an eye on our Meetup Calendar.

Stay Informed! Join our email list.

Organized weekly Parkour classes are in the works for the Scranton, Pennsylvania starting in October 2015.

To stay updated about parkour classes in Scranton, submit your email address below to become a member of our mailing list.
